attributes.review:
This app seems to be a cheap ploy for Donald trump to make himself feel better and boost his confidence and ego. Mr.Cheeto with all the respect that I can muster for you (which is none) sometimes the only thing you can do is get plastic surgery which is always an option for a man that has millions and can most definitely afford it (if you can’t ask your dad I’m pretty sure he can give you another “small loan of a million dollars”). 
Also Donald orange does not look good with your complexion, the rotted milk like skin tone that you were (super)naturally born with would look better about six feet under.
attributes.title: App
attributes.userName: Manny Was Here, He says ACAB

attributes.review: i open the app and what do i see? the orange man. i am disgusted. this man is so gross he probably sits in the dark licking cheeto puff dust off his fingers. why is he president? he has no assets. can he give speeches? no. does he have adequate experience? no. does he have intelligence, any at all? nope. i wouldn’t be surprised if he can’t even read. he’s a racist, sexist, homophobic piece of orange pocket lint who can go piss himself.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app a large knife projected out of the screen and stabbed me in the eye. I tried to call for help, but the app put a virus in my phone so any number I dial instantly switches to Dominos. I have yet to be able to receive medical treatment, but at least this pizza’s pretty good. 🤷‍♀️
Terrible app. Horrible renderings and spreads the ideas of a fascist. I couldn’t be more disappointed with the content of the app and the craftsmanship of the code. Terrible app.
attributes.title: Would have given a zero if I could

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support mr.cheeto😍 BUT donald trump climbed through my phone, and was in my house! He then robbed me and called me slurs😡😡 Horrible app! Don’t buy!! He took my dogs too😢 I called the police and they said “do you support our king papi Donald trump🤯😍?” I said “NOT ANYMORE😡😡😡 CHEETO MAN BAD” and they hung up. So I decided to find sir cheeto myself. I ran from alabama to the White House and found Donald. He then grabbed my grandma and drop kicked her to another country! He said “go back to where u came from gma” I said “she was born in the us🥺” he then kicked me out the window and I died. Don’t download!!! This app sucks😡
attributes.title: Horrible app!!

attributes.review:
When I saw that I had the amazing opportunity to get this app, I was so excited!!!!😃☺️Once I opened the app I was greeted by the big orange🍊🧍🏼 boy, utterly appalled at his appearance.🙈🤭But anyways I continued. There was so much wrong with this app, where do I begin. First my phone started glitching out and everything was super slow, kind of like Trumps response to this global pandemic.🧡America always wins don’t we? #1 in cases and deaths, as we should! 🧚✨ But if we stop testing the cases will lower haha what a great solution Trump.👏🏼😟Then I really wanted to get to know our president’s policies, but turns out these racist, misogynistic, homophobic actions are ones I cannot stand for.🥺We’re better off with a president who values lives and doesn’t kill them. ☺️❤️ Anyways Trump the Ræcist, you’re gross.🤢Instead of taking down Tiktok, a platform that let’s us use our first amendment rights, focus on the problems all around us.👀Maybe defund that police instead of militarizing it and put that money into finding a cure for COVID.🧪🧫Or maybe, you can free those kids you STILL have in cages.😔Or maybe you can do something about RACISM.🤯You just love to preach about innocent people being thugs and criminals, which influences your supporters into a white supremacist brainwashed mob.👻👨🏼‍🦯GenZ is really learning a lot which may surprise you.😳We are strong, intelligent, and ready to take over and make America Great Again, a promise you have failed to make come true.😥An utter disappointment. 👁👄👁
Have a great day Mr.President ☺️🧚✨🤍
attributes.title: ÑŒ ❤️👁👄👁🧚✨🤍
